page.title: 17A TYPICAL DAY OF A PARENT
page.content: On a week day morning my mother makes a packout then has a cup of tea and reads the paper.After that she wakes my brother up and gets dressed.At 7:45 my parents go to work.At 12:00 she has her dinner in the canteen at work. After dinner she will do some clerical work then some work on the computer. At 2:45 she has a coffee break and at 5:00 she clocks off work and walks home but sometimes she is given a lift home.When she gets home she has a cup of tea,then she makes the tea.When everybody has eaten she washes up then she watches the television and does household jobs.At 9:30 she may take a nap but wakes up in time to get the supper ready.At about 11:30 she goes to bed.
